languages.text: {n}Глейто беззвучно щерится, пока Соломон бегло окидывает побоище взглядом.{/n} "Бессмысленная резня". {n}Голос проктора бесстрастен, однако его ноздри чуть раздуваются, как если бы он учуял волнующий аромат.{/n}

{n}Glaito silently bares his teeth as Solomorne casts a cursory eye over the scene of carnage.{/n} "Pointless butchery." {n}The Proctor's voice is dispassionate, but his nostrils flare ever so slightly, as if he had caught a stirring scent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Глейто беззвучно щерится, пока Соломон бегло окидывает побоище взглядом.{/n} "Бессмысленная резня". {n}Голос проктора бесстрастен, однако его ноздри чуть раздуваются, как если бы он учуял волнующий аромат.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito silently bares his teeth as Solomorne casts a cursory eye over the scene of slaughter.{/n} "Pointless butchery." {n}The Proctor's voice is dispassionate, but his nostrils flare ever so slightly as if he had caught a stirring scent.{/n}

{n}Glaito silently bares his teeth as Solomorne casts a cursory eye over the scene of slaughter.{/n} "Pointless butchery." {n}The Proctor's voice is dispassionate, but his nostrils flare ever so slightly as if he had caught a stirring scent.{/n}

{n}Glaito silently bares his teeth as Solomorne casts a cursory eye over the scene of carnage.{/n} "Pointless butchery." {n}The Proctor's voice is dispassionate, but his nostrils flare ever so slightly, as if he had caught a stirring scent.{/n}

{n}Glaito silently bares his teeth as Solomorne casts a cursory eye over the scene of carnage.{/n} "Pointless butchery." {n}The Proctor's voice is dispassionate, but his nostrils flare ever so slightly, as if he had caught a stirring scent.{/n}

{n}Glaito silently bares his teeth as Solomorne casts a cursory eye over the scene of carnage.{/n} "Pointless butchery." {n}The Proctor's voice is dispassionate, but his nostrils flare ever so slightly, as if he had caught a stirring scent.{/n}

{n}Glaito silently bares his teeth as Solomorne casts a cursory eye over the scene of carnage.{/n} "Pointless butchery." {n}The Proctor's voice is dispassionate, but his nostrils flare ever so slightly, as if he had caught a stirring scent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙匆匆瞥了一眼屠杀现场，格雷托默默露出了尖牙。{/n}“真是场毫无意义的屠杀。”{n}他的声音很平静，但鼻孔却微张着，仿佛闻到了某种令人不安的气味。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito silently bares his teeth as Solomorne casts a cursory eye over the scene of carnage.{/n} "Pointless butchery." {n}The Proctor's voice is dispassionate, but his nostrils flare ever so slightly, as if he had caught a stirring scent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙匆匆瞥了一眼屠杀现场，格雷托默默露出了尖牙。{/n}“真是场毫无意义的屠杀。”{n}他的声音很平静，但鼻孔却微张着，仿佛闻到了某种令人不安的气味。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito enseña los dientes en silencio mientras Solomorne recorre la escena de la masacre con la mirada.{/n} «Una carnicería sin sentido». {n}Aunque la voz del Procurador carece de emociones, su nariz se ensancha ligeramente, como si hubiera captado un olor desagradable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito silently bares his teeth as Solomorne casts a cursory eye over the scene of carnage.{/n} "Pointless butchery." {n}The Proctor's voice is dispassionate, but his nostrils flare ever so slightly, as if he had caught a stirring scent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito enseña los dientes en silencio mientras Solomorne recorre la escena de la masacre con la mirada.{/n} «Una carnicería sin sentido». {n}Aunque la voz del Procurador carece de emociones, su nariz se ensancha ligeramente, como si hubiera captado un olor desagradable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito retrousse les babines silencieusement tandis que Solomorne promène rapidement son regard sur le carnage.{/n} « Une boucherie inutile. » {n}Vous ne discernez pas la moindre émotion dans son ton, mais vous percevez toutefois un infime frémissement de ses narines.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito silently bares his teeth as Solomorne casts a cursory eye over the scene of carnage.{/n} "Pointless butchery." {n}The Proctor's voice is dispassionate, but his nostrils flare ever so slightly, as if he had caught a stirring scent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito retrousse les babines silencieusement tandis que Solomorne promène rapidement son regard sur le carnage.{/n} « Une boucherie inutile. » {n}Vous ne discernez pas la moindre émotion dans son ton, mais vous percevez toutefois un infime frémissement de ses narines.{/n}

languages.text: {n}グライトは静かに歯をむき出しにし、ソロモーンは殺戮の現場をざっと見渡した。{/n}「無意味な虐殺だ」{n}代理人の声は冷淡だったが、かすかに鼻孔が広がった。何かの匂いを感じ取ったかのように。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito silently bares his teeth as Solomorne casts a cursory eye over the scene of carnage.{/n} "Pointless butchery." {n}The Proctor's voice is dispassionate, but his nostrils flare ever so slightly, as if he had caught a stirring scent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}グライトは静かに歯をむき出しにし、ソロモーンは殺戮の現場をざっと見渡した。{/n}「無意味な虐殺だ」{n}代理人の声は冷淡だったが、かすかに鼻孔が広がった。何かの匂いを感じ取ったかのように。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito sessizce dişlerini gösterirken Solomorne, katliam sahnesine şöyle bir göz atıyor.{/n} "Amaçsız bir katliam." {n}Üsteğmen'in sesi duygusuz ama burun delikleri sanki rahatsız edici bir koku almış gibi hafifçe genişliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito silently bares his teeth as Solomorne casts a cursory eye over the scene of carnage.{/n} "Pointless butchery." {n}The Proctor's voice is dispassionate, but his nostrils flare ever so slightly, as if he had caught a stirring scent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito sessizce dişlerini gösterirken Solomorne, katliam sahnesine şöyle bir göz atıyor.{/n} "Amaçsız bir katliam." {n}Üsteğmen'in sesi duygusuz ama burun delikleri sanki rahatsız edici bir koku almış gibi hafifçe genişliyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito entblößt lautlos die Zähne, während Solomorne die Szenerie des Gemetzels oberflächlich mustert.{/n} "Sinnloses Abschlachten." {n}Die Stimme des Proktors ist emotionslos, aber seine Nasenflügel beben minimal, als habe er einen störenden Geruch wahrgenommen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito silently bares his teeth as Solomorne casts a cursory eye over the scene of carnage.{/n} "Pointless butchery." {n}The Proctor's voice is dispassionate, but his nostrils flare ever so slightly, as if he had caught a stirring scent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito entblößt lautlos die Zähne, während Solomorne die Szenerie des Gemetzels oberflächlich mustert.{/n} "Sinnloses Abschlachten." {n}Die Stimme des Proktors ist emotionslos, aber seine Nasenflügel beben minimal, als habe er einen störenden Geruch wahrgenommen.{/n}
